message: I can think of a few cool things you could *maybe* do, depending what the device is running... but the screen is never going to be conveniently located (as it plugs straight into the ash tray) and it's hard to think of something cool that wouldn't be better on a smartphone (better screen, more hardware oomph, more customisable software, more sensors...)

Randomly came across this on ebay - http://cgi.ebay.com/USB-Wireless-FM-Transmitter-Car-MP3-MP4-Player-SD-MMC-/270691809924?pt=Other_MP3_Player_Accessories&hash=item3f067d3a84 

$13 including shipping in the USA for a 1.8” screen/sd card reader/fm transmitter etc – someone has to be able to come up with some cool ideas on how this can be hacked to do something neat.

 Any thoughts?

Cheers,
Dean
yeah, the fact it plugs straight into the 12V outlet in a car, really doesn't make the screen very useful, since those are usually located either with an ashtray or on seat level in a car.
